div.p: We are grateful to Sofie Enbom, Lennart Karlsson, Karin Persson, Ola Svensson and Göran Walinder at Falsterbo Bird Observatory for taking measurements for us of the wing and tarsus of Parus ater during the autumn migration in 1982-1986 and 1990. We also thank Rolf Jacobsson, Eskil Mattsson and Tore Pettersson for information about forests on Öland and F. R. Bach and D. Mathiesen for information about forests in various places in Denmark.
